thread.section_title: www.uberchild.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.uberchild.com | uberchild.com
thread.title: Khairun

author: Khairun
title: Khairun
text: I was unsure about buying a pram online but have purchased based on the reveiws. I am really pleased with the pram, I am still trying to get used to handling it all as in setting up and putting in bassinette etc.. but it seems quite easy. Only thing i would say is that the bassinette does not have a support strap inside to keep baby in place when lying down and so if you are using this mode and lift up your pram up a couple of steps for example your baby can slide down a bit in the bassinette. Otherwise so far so good.
